name: GitHub
description: Connects to GitHub and collects events and metrics from repositories.

properties.name: Access Token
properties.description: Create an Access Token in the GitHub Settings and make sure it has repo scope. If you want to have webhooks automatically set up, it also needs admin:repo_hook permissions.

properties.name: API Endpoint
properties.description: Change this if you use GitHub Enterprise.

properties.name: Webhook enabled
properties.description: If enabled, Axiom will try to automatically create the webhooks in your GitHub repositories. Polling for events will be disabled for this configuration, so make sure you have access to those repositories.
